titleStmt.title: Edinburgh, the seventh day of December, one thousand six hundred and sixty five. The Lords of his Majesties Privy Council finding it now, after a long and tender forbearance, necessary that their acts of the third of December ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Wedderburn, Peter, Sir, 1616?-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first two lines of text.
Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Pet. Wedderburne, Cl. Sti Concilii.
A proclamation ordering the removal of all non-juring ministers.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
